title: Cool profile on two of our local university clubs
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/wide_medium/public/upload/unsw1.jpg?itok=2XLTFlej

Check out these latest stories about two of our University clubs

QUT - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/university/profile-qut

and

UNSW - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/university/profile-unsw-lolsoc

replies.body:
I'm glad out local universities are doing this, and kicking some butt.

Hay this just came to me, Maraudaur can you (Or someone else) 
Like this (Profiles for our university clubs/teams)
Do profiles or spotlights of other things?

I think the Introduction to the Wrenchman, Emissaries and Instructors count.

----

I hope more universities get on-board with this.
What kind of spot lights are you looking for? I can definitely start up a series on the boards if you think this is cool =)

Well I've been thinking this for a while.
Here are some of the suggestions.

OCE rioter spotlights-
Give the community a chance to get to know our rioters, and give our rioters a chance to know the community.

Random board member spotlight-
Some of our board members have been active since 2009-2010 (Me included)
Or some of our current ones are just active all the times, that their names stick out compared to everyone else's.
Some are aggressive, some are passive, But without either of their feedbacks or comments we could never move forward.

I've noticed ALOT more people trying to Advertise themselves on the forums (I just do it for fun, but hay it never hurts)
I don't know many of them, I only know a few.

(Feel free to edit this @Riot to add in ones I've missed, or anyone else feel free to comment your link)

Jonius does great musical work based on league or even some things his worked on his own (That's pretty cool)
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUwcJ5V5F7eGZUbEq3vV-WA
(The first guy I did my series on)

Fitzky is new, but he's got some of the basics down.
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYXmP-GOGdhpw0H4DLV23tQ

Shorty had one, but all content seems to have been removed?
He wasn't that good, but he had the best attitude to any game.

I know I've missed some, but what do you think?
